response.original_title: Ultimate Cover Versions at the BBC Volume 2
response.overview: It’s time for a return trip through the best of the BBC’s music archives, celebrating more of the songs that are so good, other artists haven’t be able to resist recording their own versions. This extravaganza features the best in pop, rock and soul from the past five decades and features artists ranging from Adele and Annie Lennox to Happy Mondays and Manic Street Preachers.
response.title: Ultimate Cover Versions at the BBC Volume 2
